dollar.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the standard unit of money in the US, Canada, Australia, and some other countries, divided into 100 cents: symbol $
dollar.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: You can pay in dollars or euros at the airport.
dollar.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the name of the currency unit used in the United States, Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Singapore, and some other countries. The symbol for the dollar is $
dollar.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Chewing gum importers face a fine of as much as 10,000 Singapore dollars (US$6,171).
dollar.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a piece of paper money of this value
dollar.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: He gave the guy a dollar.
dollar.translation[1].definitions[2].def: the value of US money in relation to the money of other countries
dollar.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: The yen rose again against the dollar.
dollar.translation[1].definitions[3].def: the idea that money is more important than any other thing, often used to criticize activities done only for profit
dollar.translation[1].definitions[3].exa: responsible executives who put public interest before the almighty dollar
